title: This service honors the Do Not Track (DNT) header

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
tosdr.tldr:
Article 8, fourth bullet: "We honor “Do Not Track” (DNT) signals and do not track, plant cookies, or use advertising when a DNT browser mechanism is in place."

I recommend adding case to list.
